<COOLEDNODES><INFO sitename="Everything2" site="http://everything2.com" servertime="Tue Sep 9 18:20:10 2014">Rendered by the Cool Nodes XML Ticker</INFO> <cooled cooledby_user="avalyn" node_id="2115404" parent_e2node="2115406" author_user="Uberbanana">Babymetal</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="karma debt" node_id="1966464" parent_e2node="1864524" author_user="etouffee">And I asked myself about the present: how wide it was, how deep it was, how much was mine to keep?</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="jessicaj" node_id="2114332" parent_e2node="2113992" author_user="Hazelnut">A Farewell to Legal Aid</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="NinjaPenguin" node_id="1142660" parent_e2node="1142214" author_user="czeano">I've got your Appalachian Aftermath... RIGHT HERE.</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Clockmaker" node_id="2058311" parent_e2node="1952763" author_user="StuartO)))">Parents Music Resource Center</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="jethro bodine" node_id="2015135" parent_e2node="2014979" author_user="matt schroeder">Nivea for Men</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="haqiqat" node_id="2115376" parent_e2node="2115375" author_user="Clockmaker">The Long Ships</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Auspice" node_id="2115355" parent_e2node="2048243" author_user="Tem42">The Fault in Our Stars</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Mister Chu" node_id="1171371" parent_e2node="39523" author_user="Ashley Pomeroy">Roland TB-303</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="per ou" node_id="1765271" parent_e2node="1175129" author_user="montecarlo">burqa</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="mad girl's love song" node_id="1755678" parent_e2node="1755677" author_user="dutchess">This week, Jen's got a new man, or, another take on some algebraic properties</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Everyone2" node_id="651054" parent_e2node="650987" author_user="wharfinger">The "Geek Pride" phenomenon</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="moeyz" node_id="2115390" parent_e2node="2115391" author_user="Chord">The Night is not young</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Bitriot" node_id="1988044" parent_e2node="778520" author_user="Doctor Uncle">Head so full my mouth won't shut</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Everyone2" node_id="2099204" parent_e2node="2099201" author_user="Yurei">I ambushed the Chaplain's Assistant with Jason Segel's dick.</cooled>
</COOLEDNODES>
node.title: Cool Nodes XML Ticker
